tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces

Interface ISlot


  • public interface ISlot
    ISlot is the base Ad placement unit, which is used to play the ads.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<IAdInstance> getAdInstances()
      Get all ad instances in the slot.
      android.view.ViewGroup getBase()
      Get slot display base object, the ad will be drawn on the base.
      java.lang.String getCustomId()
      Get custom id of the slot.
      double getEmbeddedAdsDuration()
      Get the duration of the embedded ads.
      double getEndTimePosition()
      Get the end time position of the slot.
      int getHeight()
      Get height of the slot.
      double getPlayheadTime()
      Get playheadTime of the slot.
      IConstants.TimePositionClass getSlotTimePositionClass()
      Get the time position class of the slot
      IConstants.SlotType getSlotType()
      Get type of the slot
      double getTimePosition()
      Get time position of the slot.
      double getTotalDuration()
      Get duration of the slot.
      int getWidth()
      Get width of the slot.
      void pause()
      Pause the slot.
      void play()
      Play the slot.
      void preload()
      Preload the slot.
      void resume()
      Resume the slot.
      void setParameter(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object value)
      Set the parameters at slot level.
      void skipCurrentAd()
      Skip the current ad in the slot.
      void stop()
      Stop the slot.

    • Method Detail

      • getCustomId

        java.lang.String getCustomId()
        Get custom id of the slot.
        Returns:
        custom id of the slot

      • getSlotType

        IConstants.SlotType getSlotType()
        Get type of the slot
        Returns:
        the enum value of the slot type

      • getTimePosition

        double getTimePosition()
        Get time position of the slot.
        Returns:
        time position of the slot

      • getSlotTimePositionClass

        IConstants.TimePositionClass getSlotTimePositionClass()
        Get the time position class of the slot
        Returns:
        enumerated value of the time position class

      • getEmbeddedAdsDuration

        double getEmbeddedAdsDuration()
        Get the duration of the embedded ads.
        Returns:
        the duration of embedded ads, -1 if unavailable

      • getEndTimePosition

        double getEndTimePosition()
        Get the end time position of the slot.
        Returns:
        the end time position of the temporal slot, -1 if unavailable

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Get width of the slot.
        Returns:
        width in device-independent pixels

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Get height of the slot.
        Returns:
        height in device-independent pixels

      • getBase

        android.view.ViewGroup getBase()
        Get slot display base object, the ad will be drawn on the base.
        Returns:
        the ViewGroup object. For Temporal Slot it is a FrameLayout, for nonTemporal Slot it is a RelativeLayout. If failed to create slotBase will return null

      • play

        void play()
        Play the slot.

      • preload

        void preload()
        Preload the slot.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop the slot.

      • pause

        void pause()
        Pause the slot.

      • resume

        void resume()
        Resume the slot.

      • skipCurrentAd

        void skipCurrentAd()
        Skip the current ad in the slot. Note that the fallback ads associated with the skipped ad will not be played.

      • setParameter

        void setParameter(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.Object value)
        Set the parameters at slot level.
        Parameters:
        name - key of the parameter to be set
        value - value for the key

      • getTotalDuration

        double getTotalDuration()
        Get duration of the slot.
        Returns:
        a number in seconds, which is greater than or equal to 0

      • getPlayheadTime

        double getPlayheadTime()
        Get playheadTime of the slot.
        Returns:
        a number in seconds, which is greater than or equal to 0

      • getAdInstances

        java.util.List<IAdInstance> getAdInstances()
        Get all ad instances in the slot. Only for player use.
        Returns:
        List of ad instances
